relation: Great for these types of students
Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus
They are excellent. I have never felt more safe in my life no exaggeration.
Cru is great! It is a church community from Ohio University that comes down to hocking and i love it.
Outgoing people. People who like outdoorsy stuff, and camo print.
I think that you save a lot of money just going here especially for living in a dorm.
There is not to much to do for fun but I love going to church so that is what I do for fun.
The food is not so great if I have to be honest. There is not many choices so I usually eat things from my room. Plus the food is expensive here and the meal plan sucks.

Dorm life is amazing! I love my RSM which is the hall manager. The people around me are great and I get along with everyone. I love living outside of my home and it is great and my room is a nice size big enough to have a lot of my things from home in.

Most of my classes are not to bad but my Ethics class is so extremely hard and I'm taking that online so I would suggest not taking an online class unless you are good with figuring things out by yourself.

If you would like to go Hocking college i would suggest bringing a car. Talk to your advisers to make sure you are on track. Make sure you meet your roommates and talk to people because the people are great.
Hocking College is great if you like small schools and still want to live in a college environment.Hocking has a lot of outdoor majors. The college has lots of different majors.

textAfterTable: The faculty here at the school are the best. They are nice and helpful. And will make sure and do anything to make sure you pass. Tips for prospective students Stay on top of you studies and homework. It really makes a difference and you feel more accomplished. Plus, you can look back and say I did that. I finished college. In three sentences Going to Hocking College is one of the best choices I have ever made in my life. The location is beautiful and there is a lot of outdoor activities to do. Also, the faculty and staff are super nice and super helpful when you do ask for help and provides hands-on learning. Which a lot of other colleges do not. Login to rate or flag the reviews Mark from Nelsonville, OH 01/13/2011 Reviewer is A past student here. 1 out of 3 people found this review useful. 3 of 34 Categories Comments Bang for the buck
